title: NA offers Fateha for the late brother of former Governor KP and others
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 20 (APP):The National Assembly(NA) on Monday offered Fateha prayers for the departed soul of former Governor Khyber Pakhtunkhwa(KP) Iqbal Zafar Jhagra â€˜s brother, former federal minister Afifa Mamdot and others.
Ali Muhammad Khan led the prayer after the beginning of the session, following the recitation of the Holy Quran and Naat, at the request of Speaker NA, Sardar Ayaz Sadiq who was in the chair.
The House also offered Fateh for the personnel of security forces and citizens who embraced martyrdom in the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa areas and for others who died in accidents across the country.
